entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Three Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:52 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Three Hills 01:00 AM MST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -9.7°C
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: NNE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 cm over eastern sections. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
